Notion Direct Saver

Streamline your web research and content curation with Notion Direct Saver - the ultimate Chrome extension for Notion enthusiasts!

🚀 Key Features

- Instant Saving: Select any text on a webpage and save it directly to your Notion database with just a few clicks.
- Seamless Integration: Works flawlessly with your existing Notion setup.
- Customizable: Save to any Notion database of your choice.
- User-Friendly Interface: Clean, modern design with dark mode support for comfortable use at any time of day.
- Privacy-Focused: Your Notion API key and database ID are stored locally for maximum security.

🔧 How It Works

1. Set Up: Enter your Notion API Key and Database ID in the extension settings.
2. Select: Click "Start Selection" and highlight any text on a webpage.
3. Save: Confirm your selection, and voilà! It's in your Notion database.

🎯 Perfect For

- 📚 Students compiling research for essays and projects
- ✍️ Writers collecting inspiration and quotes
- 💼 Professionals gathering industry insights
- 🧠 Knowledge workers building their second brain
- 🌐 Anyone who loves to curate web content in Notion

🔒 Privacy & Security

We take your data privacy seriously. Notion Direct Saver:
- Stores your API key and database ID locally on your device
- Never sends your data to any third-party servers
- Only interacts with the Notion API to save your selected content

🛠 Setup Guide

1. Install the Notion Direct Saver extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Obtain your Notion API Key from www.notion.so/my-integrations
3. Copy the Database ID from the URL of your target Notion database.
4. Enter both in the extension popup and click "Save Settings".
5. Start saving web content directly to Notion!

💡 Pro Tips

- Create a dedicated database in Notion for web clippings to keep your saved content organized.
- Use Notion's powerful filtering and sorting features to make the most of your saved content.
- Combine with Notion's web clipper for a comprehensive web content saving solution.
